title: Customer Card Schema
description: Schema for validating customer card data from ProHandel API

id.description: Unique identifier for the customer card

customerNumber.description: Customer number associated with the card

isActive.description: Whether the customer card is active

validFrom.description: Date from which the card is valid

validTo.description: Date until which the card is valid

lastChange.description: Last change timestamp of the customer card

isDeleted.description: Whether the customer card is deleted
